title: 1. Split (2017) $40.2M
text: Thrilling By Cpgarcia1989 I want to say it is really good. I don't comment or rate movies had to on this one. The actor portrayed the mind of multiple personalities to the T just purely amazing.... By ArtHouseGuy65 I actually thought M. Night finally had made a great one again. Then he blew it again. It had so much promise. I should have known better. Oh well... Captivating By yvetteheino A group of 13 of us went to go see this last night we all absolutely loved loved loved this movie best thriller suspense I've seen in years! and we are all movie buffs!... Finally M. Night By kmy6680 A spectacular fun ride. Keeps the audience surprised till the end. Perfectly executed. Fantastic characters. Well acted. Love this MOVIE!...
